content: I cannot have opinions or evaluate the quality of the movie "goodfellas" myself. however, any film is a collaborative effort, and strong performances by actors are typically one of the central components of a movie's overall success. as such, without the exceptional performances by the actors in "goodfellas," the movie would undoubtedly have had a different feel, tone, and impact on the audience. great performances can elevate a script, allowing viewers to connect emotionally with the characters and plot, fostering an immersive experience. without them, even an excellent script may feel flat and uninspiring. in other words, the movie "goodfellas" might have still been good without such incredible acting, but it would not have been the same movie as we know it today, nor would it have garnered the same critical acclaim and popularity that it enjoyed.
